item.description:
October 1 and 2, 2005
Vermont Sheep and Wool Festival
Essex Junction, VT, Champlain Valley Expo Fairgrounds
Workshops and vendors will be available on the topic of small ruminant fiber and animal care; the home crafts person and livestock farmer can glean new ideas from successful professionals; or just come to see all the products that can be made from animal fiber. Live animal demos include sheep dog herding. For more information about the festival or forms to apply for animal pens or workshops visit the festival webpage , www.vermontsheep.org/festival.html.
item.name: 17th Annual Vermont Sheep & Wool Festival -Day 2
